definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: Microtubules have dominated our think about the mitotic mechanisms.
sentences.chinese: 微管促使我的思考有絲分裂的機制。

sentences.english: After extrusion of polar body and the completion of the first cell cycle, microfilaments concentrated to the cleavage furrows.
sentences.chinese: 極體排出和第一次有絲分裂時微絲在卵裂溝處富集。

sentences.english: Microtubules have dominated our think about the mitotic mechanisms.
sentences.chinese: 例如，有絲分裂的途徑可以看到在粘菌之絨泡。

sentences.english: Mitotic cells could be seen too.
sentences.chinese: 有絲分裂細胞仍可見到。

sentences.english: Double fertilization is the type of the Premitotic syngamy .
sentences.chinese: 雙受精過程屬有絲分裂前配子融合類型。

sentences.english: Nearly half of these genes are involved in mitosis.
sentences.chinese: 這些基因的一半左右參與了有絲分裂。

sentences.english: The mitotic route is seen, for example, in the since mold Physarum.
sentences.chinese: 例如，有絲分裂的途徑可以看到在粘菌之絨泡。

sentences.english: Report About Abnormal Mitosis in Root Tip Cells of Allium sativum L.
sentences.chinese: 大蒜根尖細胞有絲分裂發生異常現象的報告。

sentences.english: Prophase --- The first stage of cell division, during which the chromosomes become visible as discrete structures and subsequently thicken and shorten.
sentences.chinese: 細胞有絲分裂或減數分裂的第一個階段。

sentences.english: In these groups, gametes are produced by mitosis.
sentences.chinese: 在這些種類中，配子是由有絲分裂形成的。

sentences.english: At anaphase of mitosis, the organelles in microspore cytoplasm are concentrated in the future vegetative cell pole.
sentences.chinese: 有絲分裂後期，細胞器集中於未來的營養細胞極。

sentences.english: The mitotic route can be seen.
sentences.chinese: 有絲分裂的途徑可以看到。

sentences.english: The double fertilization is the type of Premitotic syngamy.
sentences.chinese: 雙受精作用屬於有絲分裂前配子融合類型。

sentences.english: The Role of Kinetochore Protein Mitosin in Mitosis;
sentences.chinese: 有絲分裂的途徑可以看到。

sentences.english: The double fertilization is the type of the premitotic syngamy.
sentences.chinese: 玉米雙受精屬於有絲分裂前配子融合的類型。
